entry.summary: Role Based Access Control (RBAC) in k8s In this post you will learn about enabling access to your EKS cluster using IAM roles. You can read more about kubernetes Role Based Access Control system from the k8s official documentation page K8s uses an API group called rbac.authorization.k8s.io, which is used to drive authorization decisions.
